Module com.github.stephengold.joltjni
Package com.github.stephengold.joltjni.enumerate

Enum Class EPathRotationConstraintType

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Enum<EPathRotationConstraintType>
com.github.stephengold.joltjni.enumerate.EPathRotationConstraintType
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<EPathRotationConstraintType>, Constable
public enum EPathRotationConstraintType extends Enum<EPathRotationConstraintType>
Enumerate options for constraining the rotation of body2 in a PathConstraint.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class java.lang.Enum

    Enum.EnumDesc<E extends Enum<E>>

  • Enum Constant Summary

    Enum Constants
    Enum Constant
    Description
    ConstrainAroundBinormal
    allow rotation only around the binormal vector (perpendicular to the path)
    ConstrainAroundNormal
    allow rotation only around the normal vector (perpendicular to the path)
    ConstrainAroundTangent
    allow rotation only around the tangent vector (following the path)
    ConstrainToPath
    fully constrain rotation to the path (including its normal and tangent vectors)
    Free
    don't constrain body rotation
    FullyConstrained
    fully constrain rotation to match body1
